title: Build Android APK
description: Use Unity command line to build Android APK automatically
steps: 1. Pull latest code from GitHub (git pull origin main)
2. Ensure Android Build Support is installed in Unity
3. Run Unity command line build: Unity.exe -batchmode -nographics -projectPath . -executeMethod BuildScript.BuildFromCommandLine -quit -logFile build.log
4. If Android SDK/NDK not found, try building via Unity GUI: Tools > Hello Game > Build Android APK
7. Git commit with [NODE_COMPLETE] tag and push
notes: If Unity command line fails, use the menu Tools > Hello Game > Build Android APK in Unity GUI. The user has Unity open at E:\Ai\hello-game
